name: Rhythm & Beat
description:
A RECREATION OF THE INFAMOUS GAME & WATCH HANDHELD CLONE, DECOMPOSED BY THE DECAYING CORPSE OF J.S. BACH AND PROGRAMMED BY HIS CLONE FROM THE FUTURE.

A short revisit of an old handheld, with the gameplay  of a modern concept.

A game created in 48 hours for the LCD Game Jam.

Instructions are in the game.

Inspired quite a bit by Rhythm Doctor.

Also, if you just want to listen to the music then, you can just avoid pressing space while the song is playing.
